original_title: 夫の上司に犯され続けて7日目、私は理性を失った…。
overview: From that day on, I was punishable. Why… I thought I couldn't endure too much at first and tried to tell my husband many times. But if I talk to my husband, we'd argue. Every time his boss visited me, I was struck by the sensation of hot things coming from behind my body. I didn't want to admit that I was feeling more for him than my husband...
title: After Being Taken By My Husband's Boss For Seven Days, I Lost My Mind...
